text: @atrupar Wasn't it Pence's job to hold up official-looking papers/folders/binders in front of the press? Doesn't Mikey have anything to do anymore? What a joke. One bad one after another. @PressSec @VP @realDonaldTrump #TrumpPandemicFailure #DepravedHeartMurder #coronavirus #COVIDー19
